rows.label: qev019201_MSG0001
rows.name: Where's that chump gone off to...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Muh? Wait, I know that face...
You're [ST:playername ], yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0011
rows.name: Nod in agreement.

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0021
rows.name: Keep your identity concealed from the suspicious man.

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ah-HA! I finally found you, you thievin' little punk!
I got words for you, see?! We got problems![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Not the least of which is that you made THE Tobias
hike all the way out here just to chew you out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh yeah? Well, if you see [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ], I want you to pass on
a little message from me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Tell [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] that Tobias is waiting outside the BLADE
barracks to put an end to [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] little thieving spree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0007
rows.name:
And if [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] has the guts to turn up, I'll be there to give
[ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] what-for![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0008
rows.name:
You've been planting data probes all over lately, yeah?
That make you feel good? Make you feel like the
big[ST:gender p1= man p2= lady ] on campus?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0009
rows.name: Well, yank 'em back out! Every last one, you hear me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0010
rows.name:
You've been costing me a fortune, and I am NOT the
kind of man what likes folks messing with his wallet.
We clear?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0030
rows.name: Provoke

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0031
rows.name: Roll your eyes waaaaay back in your head.

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0040
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Tobias to explain what he's talking about.

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, we got ourselves a real tough [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] here!
You even got any idea what you've done, tough [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0012
rows.name:
...Wait. You mean you been raiding people's turf
without even REALIZING it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well, here's the deal—every stupid data probe you stick
in the ground cuts into the number of users accessing
MINE! That clear enough for ya?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0014
rows.name:
I been sitting there watching my profits drop day by
day, and I don't like it one damn bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Huh? The Lifehold? Aw, who gives a crap?
I'm talking 'bout cash here, pal! MY cash![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Look, pal, if brains were dynamite you couldn't blow
your nose, so lemme spell it out for you real slow...
All the money...in New LA...is MINE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Any of those cowards wants to know about the world
outside, they can keep accessing my research data
probes just like they always have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0050
rows.name: Argue

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0051
rows.name:
Mount a passionate rebuttal
against Tobias's unfair claim.

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0060
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0061
rows.name:
Rub your fingers together like you're
playing the world's smallest violin.

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Rules? Duty? Forget that noise! I'm talking about cash
here, pal! Cold hard credits! You get me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0019
rows.name:
I got no time for your stupid excuses, so if you won't
listen to me, that's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0020
rows.name:
...The hell is that smug look about, pal?
I don't give two rips if you wanna listen to me or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0021
rows.name:
Enough talk! We're gonna have us a little wager to see
who the REAL boss is around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0022
rows.name:
...Easy there, ya mad dog. I ain't talking violence.
All them medical bills are a waste of money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0023
rows.name:
I'm saying we race to earn 70 large with FrontierNav.
...That's 70,000 credits, in case you're still slow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Loser does whatever the winner says. ...Well?
Are ya gonna accept, or are ya...chicken?
Baaawk bawk bawk bawk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0025
rows.name:
Ha! Then the deal is done, and YOU, pal, are the
world's biggest idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0026
rows.name:
You even know who I am? I'm a damned genius
Pathfinder! A prodigal! Ain't no BLADE can outearn
me, least of all some little punk like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm gonna wring 70,000 credits out of FrontierNav so
fast your head'll spin right off your body.
RIGHT THE HELL OFF IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0028
rows.name:
Bwa ha ha! You don't even KNOW, pal!
I got money flying at me so fast, I gotta parry it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0029
rows.name:
New LA's a sad little cage full'a sad little people.
Give 'em a little peek at the outside world,
and they pay through the nose![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0030
rows.name:
You're crazy if you think I'm letting you horn in on a
racket this sweet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0031
rows.name:
I'll have a piddling 70,000 credits in no time, and then
you can wave bye-bye to all your data probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0032
rows.name:
How goes, you thieving little punk? Bad? Ha!
Me, I'm just shy of that 70 grand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0033
rows.name:
You even got two nickels to rub together yet?
Come on—just bow down and admit defeat already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0070
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0071
rows.name: Calmly inform Tobias that you completed the wager.

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0080
rows.name: Gloat

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Tobias you won. Then laugh in his fat face.

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0034
rows.name: You seem awfully calm. You give up ye...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0035
rows.name: The hell you laughing about, pal? You go craz...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0036
rows.name:
WHAT? You got the full 70,000 simoleons?
...Nah, there ain't no WAY you beat ol' Tobias![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0037
rows.name:
You're a lying dog, and I'm gonna prove it right...
Ah, hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0038
rows.name: Fine. You got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0039
rows.name:
But how the hell'd you get it so fast, huh? I'm calling
foul on this! Dirty pool! It ain't possible, you hear me?
You're a dirty cheatin' fink![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0090
rows.name: Divulge

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0091
rows.name: Explain your methodical installation methods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_JNK0100
rows.name: Conceal

rows.label: qev019201_SEL0101
rows.name: Hint at your wide range of awesome secret techniques.

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0040
rows.name:
And whaddya think I'VE been doing over here, huh?
Eating bonbons? I done walked every CORNER of this
stupid planet looking for places to put research probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0041
rows.name:
What? But I know every FrontierNav trick in the book.
Hell, I WROTE that book![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0042
rows.name:
I've been at this for a lot longer than you, pal, so why?
Why, huh? WHY?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0043
rows.name: What are you doing that I ain't?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0044
rows.name:
Or are you gonna spew the same pap Kirsty did about
your "love for FrontierNav"? Barf![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0045
rows.name:
No... No, this don't count. I won't accept it!
This ain't over by a long shot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0046
rows.name:
I'm gonna find every last person who accesses your
research probes and make sure they go back to
watching mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019201_MSG0047
rows.name: Enjoy your piddling profits till then, chump! Rrragh![ST:wait ]
